TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataRecord

summary.span: 为 提供对每行中的列值的访问权限，并由访问关系数据库的.NET Framework 数据提供程序实现。

span.span: Provides access to the column values within each row for a , and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并接口，用于实现的继承类`DataReader`类。The and interfaces enable an inheriting class to implement a `DataReader` class. 这提供了一种方法读取的结果集的一个或多个只进流。This provides a way of reading one or more forward-only streams of result sets. 有关详细信息`DataReader`类，请参阅[使用 DataReader 检索数据](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader.md)。For more information about `DataReader` classes, see [Retrieving Data Using a DataReader](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader.md). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 通常情况下，执行此操作通过获取`DataReader`通过`ExecuteReader`方法的`Command`对象。Typically, you do this by obtaining a `DataReader` through the `ExecuteReader` method of the `Command` object. 继承的类必须实现所有继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 提供程序实现`DataReader`所需公开公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型中的数据。Providers implementing a `DataReader` are required to expose data in common language runtime (CLR) types. 类型强制转换为在 CLR 中未包含一些类型定义。Type coercion is defined for some types not included in the CLR. 这些值可能会作为具有 CLR 类型替换类型符合条件访问。These values may be accessed as alternative types that comply with CLR types. 例如下, 表列出了从 OLE DB 数据类型到 CLR 类型，与在括号中的替代类型的建议的映射。As an example, the following table lists suggested mappings from OLE DB data types to CLR types, with alternative types in parentheses. |OLE DB 类型OLE DB type|CLR 类型CLR type| |-----------------|--------------| |DBTYPE_BOOLDBTYPE_BOOL|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_BSTRDBTYPE_BSTR|字符串string| |DBTYPE_BYTESDBTYPE_BYTES|byte[]byte[]| |DBTYPE_CYDBTYPE_CY|十进制Decimal| |DBTYPE_DATEDBTYPE_DATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBDATEDBTYPE_DBDATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMEDBTYPE_DBTIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMPDBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DECIMALDBTYPE_DECIMAL|十进制Decimal| |DBTYPE_EMPTYDBTYPE_EMPTY|nullnull| |DBTYPE_ERRORDBTYPE_ERROR|ExternalExceptionExternalException| |DBTYPE_FILETIMEDBTYPE_FILETIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_GUIDDBTYPE_GUID|GUIDGuid| |DBTYPE_HCHAPTERDBTYPE_HCHAPTER|不受支持not supported| |DBTYPE_I1DBTYPE_I1|SByteSByte| |DBTYPE_I2DBTYPE_I2|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_I4DBTYPE_I4|Int32Int32| |DBTYPE_I8DBTYPE_I8|Int64Int64| |DBTYPE_IDISPATCHDBTYPE_IDISPATCH|objectobject| |DBTYPE_IUNKNOWNDBTYPE_IUNKNOWN|objectobject| |DBTYPE_NULLDBTYPE_NULL|DBNull.ValueDBNull.Value| |DBTYPE_NUMERICDBTYPE_NUMERIC|十进制Decimal| |DBTYPE_PROPVARIANTDBTYPE_PROPVARIANT|objectobject| |DBTYPE_R4DBTYPE_R4|SingleSingle| |DBTYPE_R8DBTYPE_R8|DoubleDouble| |DBTYPE_STRDBTYPE_STR|字符串string| |DBTYPE_UDTDBTYPE_UDT|不受支持not supported| |DBTYPE_UI1DBTYPE_UI1|字节 (Int16)byte (Int16)| |DBTYPE_UI2DBTYPE_UI2|UInt16 (Int32)UInt16 (Int32)| |DBTYPE_UI4DBTYPE_UI4|UInt32 (Int64)UInt32 (Int64)| |DBTYPE_UI8DBTYPE_UI8|UInt64 （十进制）UInt64 (Decimal)| |DBTYPE_VARIANTDBTYPE_VARIANT|objectobject| |DBTYPE_VARNUMERICDBTYPE_VARNUMERIC|不受支持not supported| |DBTYPE_WSTRDBTYPE_WSTR|字符串string| ## Examples 下面的示例创建的派生类的实例， ，和。The following example creates instances of the derived classes, , , and . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，然后。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果未位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录中的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise, the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行不返回行的查询后 (例如，使用方法)，返回-1。After executing a query that does not return rows (for example, using the method), returns -1.

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

summary.span: 以布尔值的形式获取指定列的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.

returns.span: 列的值。

span.span: The value of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不执行任何转换。No conversions are performed. 因此，检索到的数据必须已经是一个布尔值;否则将生成异常。Therefore, the data retrieved must already be a Boolean; otherwise an exception is generated.

exception.span: 传递的索引超出了 0 到 的范围。

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetBytes (int i, long fieldOffset, byte[] buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 i, int64 fieldOffset, unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 bufferoffset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);
abstract member GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 字段中作为读取操作起始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: 开始读取操作的 buffer 的索引。

span.span: The index for buffer to start the read operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 将字节流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 通常这是该字段的确切长度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果`GetBytes`具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 如果传递的缓冲区，则`null`，返回行的长度以字节为单位。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the row in bytes. 不执行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是一个字节数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

exception.span: 传递的索引超出了 0 到 的范围。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

summary.span: 将字符流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字符数。

span.span: The actual number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 通常这是该字段的确切长度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的确切长度如果`GetChars`具有用于从字段获取字符。However, the number returned may be less than the exact length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 如果传递的缓冲区，则`null`，`GetChars`以字符为单位返回字段的长度。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, `GetChars` returns the length of the field in characters. 不执行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是字符数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character array.

(例如，`DataTypeName`可能是"integer"，而`Type.Name`可能是"Int32"。)(for example, `DataTypeName` may be "integer", while `Type.Name` may be "Int32".)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetOrdinal(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetOrdinal (name As String) As Integer

span.span: The name of the field to find.

summary.span: 返回已命名字段的索引。

span.span: Return the index of the named field.

returns.span: 已命名字段的索引。

span.span: The index of the named field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetOrdinal` 第一次执行区分大小写查找。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，进行第二个的不区分大小写搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. `GetOrdinal` 不区分假名宽度。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 如果找不到命名字段的索引，`IndexOutOfRangeException`引发。If the index of the named field is not found, an `IndexOutOfRangeException` is thrown. 因为基于序号的查找比命名查找更有效，它是效率低下调用`GetOrdinal`在循环内。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 节省时间，可以调用`GetOrdinal`一次并将结果分配给整数变量在循环内使用。Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用继承方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the inherited method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetValues(object[] values) cil managed
Public Function GetValues (values As Object()) As Integer

param.name: values
param.span: 要将属性字段复制到其中的 数组。

span.span: An array of to copy the attribute fields into.

summary.span: 使用当前记录的列值填充对象的数组。

span.span: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.

returns.span: 数组中的 实例数。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了一种有效方式检索所有列，而不是逐个都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 可以将传递数组，其中包含的结果行中包含的列数少于。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组保存复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以查看是否存在 null 列的值在调用类型化的 get 方法 (例如， ， ，依次类推) 以避免引发错误。Call this method to see if there are null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, , , and so on) to avoid raising an error.

param.name: i
param.span: 要获取的列的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the column to get.

summary.span: 获取位于指定索引处的列。

span.span: Gets the column located at the specified index.

value.span: 位于作为 指定索引处的列。

span.span: The column located at the specified index as an .

exception.span: 传递的索引超出了 0 到 的范围。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(name As String) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ name); };

span.span: The name of the column to find.

summary.span: 获取具有指定名称的列。

span.span: Gets the column with the specified name.

value.span: 具有指定名称、作为 的列。

span.span: The column with the specified name as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次执行区分大小写的查找。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失败，进行第二个的不区分大小写搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 此方法是不区分假名宽度。This method is kana-width insensitive.

exception.span: 未找到具有指定名称的列。

span.span: No column with the specified name was found.
